VConnect (ụlọ ahịa nke Mplify Limited) bụ ahịa n'ịntanetị nke nyeere ndị ọrụ aka iwe ndị ọkachamara mpaghara maka mkpa ọrụ
E nwere ihe karịrị ọrụ otú narị edepụtara na Vconnect nke sitere na nrụzi na mmezi, mmezi ụlọ na ọfịs, ihe omume na ntụrụndụ, ọrụ onwe onye, ọrụ azụmahịa na nhazi
Vconnect nyere ọrụ maka Naịjirịa na Ghana.

N'afọ 2010, mgbe ọ na-enweghị ike ịchọta azụmaahịa mpaghara Naijiria n'ịntanetị, Deepankar malitere ịhazi otu ndị ga-enyere aka ịnakọta ozi SMEs mpaghara nke enwere ike ịnweta site na Google-esque local search engine.
Ya na onye guzobere ya, Anand Chander Mohan malitere Vconnect.com na 8 Maachị 2011
Vconnect bụ akụkụ nke Tolaram Group, nke nwere isi na Singapore.
Na June 23, 2018, Vconnect malitere 'Market by Vconnect', ahịa ọrụ ebe ndị nwere azụmaahịa nwere ike ịchọta ndị ga-azuta ahịa ha
Site na nke a, ndị nwe ụlọ ọrụ nwere ike ịchọta ma zụta maka ndị ahịa nwere nhọrọ ịkwụ ụgwọ maka otu onye ahịa ma ọ bụ kwụọ ụgwọ maka atụmatụ ngwugwu
Na njikọ aka, Vconnect webatara Take a Pledge, usoro iji nyochaa njirimara nke azụmaahịa niile edebanyere aha na Vconnect.
